body: Using their natural stealth or magical invisibility, these troglodytes sneak up on enemies, then either slip away to report what they've seen to the tribe or attack enemies that look weak.
name: Troglodyte Sneaks

sections.melee: mwk club +6 (1d6+3), bite +0 (1d4+1), claw +0 (1d4+1) or bite +5 (1d4+3), 2 claws +5 (1d4+3)
sections.other_gear: javelins (4), mwk club, sack of uncut gems (worth 120 gp in total), 16 gp

sections.body: Far-ranging and mobile, troglodyte skulkers spend most of their time away from the tribe.

sections.name: Troglodyte Skulker
sections.skills: Acrobatics +8, Climb +7, Disable Device +2, Escape Artist +8, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +3, Perception +8, Stealth +12 (+16 in rocky areas)
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure moderate wounds, smokesticks (2)

sections.melee: mwk club +4 (1d6), bite -2 (1d4), claw -2 (1d4) or bite +3 (1d4), 2 claws +3 (1d4)
sections.other_gear: mwk club, cloak of resistance +1, 150 gp

spells.sorcerer spells known:
(CL 4th; concentration +7)

2nd (4/day)-acid arrow

1st (7/day)-cause fear (DC 15), corrosive touch, ray of enfeeblement (DC 15), summon monster I

0 (at will)-acid splash, daze (DC 13), detect magic, ghost sound (DC 13), mage hand, mending

Bloodline Abyssal

sections.feats: Combat Casting, Eschew Materials, Silent Spell, Spell Focus (evocation)

sections.body: Arcane casters often become scouts, as their divine counterparts monopolize the positions of power within the tribe. Most troglodyte sorcerers have the Abyssal, Deep Earth, Draconic, or Undead bloodline.

sections.name: Troglodyte Sorcerer
sections.skills: Knowledge (arcana) +7, Knowledge (planes) +4, Spellcraft +6, Stealth +9 (+13 in rocky areas)
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, wand of invisibility (10 charges)
